when i used to see my paternal and maternal uncles the rest of them working for daily wages pray in heart that god would save me from such physically rigorous labor we our doing job a laborer wish always prompted us request allah keep away work involving physical childhood watch menial spare hardship selling things on handcarts toil hearts is hard body please this during your their prayed protect strenuous it gave birth desire protects saw wished did were
